descriptionHTML:
Classic Watch Face

The new Material Classic watch face is carefully designed to display time and data thought wear 2.0 complications, while keeping it simple, elegant, clean, minimalist and fully customizable.

Wear 2.0 owners can use the new complications feature. You can choose between data providers to select what you want to see in your wrist:

- Date;
- World clock from any location around the globe;
- Battery level;
- Steps;
- Weather information
( you might need to have a weather app installed before this provider works: Eg AccuWeather);
- Notifications;
- Calendar events;
- Sunset times;
- App and Contacts shortcut;
- Music currently playing;
- More.

The Material Classic watch face is inspired by wear material design, choose ANY color for background,clock and watch hands.

Complications are only compatible with Android Wear 2.0.

Additional Settings:

- Full Ambient Mode: This mode only dims the screen when the watch enters ambient mode. It also may cause some additional battery use.

- Rotate Bezel: Enable rotate animation matching seconds passing in the watch bezel. It also may consume some additional battery. This option comes enabled by default.

- Color Picker: You can choose ANY color to match your mood and style.

On Android Wear 1.X the "complications" are still displayed, but you cannot change data provider, they are:

- Phone Battery;
- Watch battery:
- Notification count;
- Date

Enjoy.
Learn more about our work: www.pifox.io

If something goes wrong we will be pleased to help you.
